title: [Large-scale] Mathematics Teacher Education Design Utilizing Augmented Reality (AR)

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of elementary mathematics pedagogy and experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: AR practical training and small-group collaborative learning utilizing personal smartphones/tablets

learning_goals: Effectively apply AR technology to visualize math concepts and design educational scenarios
Perform the process of planning, producing, and evaluating AR-based math instructional materials through collaborative inquiry
Diagnose attitudes toward digital educational tools and propose improvement strategies

resources: AR development tools (Unity/Metaverse), math education AR content templates, LMS system

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
